author: Special Correspondent
text:
A day-long seminar on occupational health practice in industry will be held on January 8. The seminar, aimed at updating doctors, human resource professionals and safety officers, among others, is being organised by Deepam Hospitals, Chromepet.

P. Bose, Director, Department of Industrial Safety and Health, will be the chief guest at the event. For details, contact A. Mahalingam, Chief Operating Officer, at Ph: 9710485295; 2525india@gmail.com and www.deepamhospitals.com.
title: Seminar on occupational health
